titles.title: A resolution supporting the goals and ideals of "Children's Grief Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: 11/13/2012--Introduced. Supports the goals and ideals of Children's Grief Awareness Day to raise awareness of and support for grieving children.
